other_tests.findings: Undetectable ACTH concentrations, confirming ACTH deficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sequential measurements under basal or stimulated conditions showed consistent lack of response.

other_tests.findings: Cortisol was undetectable on several occasions, indicating cortisol deficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Persistently low cortisol levels during hypoglycemic episodes.

other_tests.findings: Negative results for antipituitary autoantibodies as well as thyroid antibodies.

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic Testing for TPIT, LIF, IKAROS, EOS
other_tests.findings: No pathogenic allelic variation identified; normal coding sequence.
Pituitary was either normal or hypoplastic; unremarkable MRI in one patient.
